headline: Fortinet Q4 Beat, Cloud Progress And Buybacks Shape Valuation Story
summary: Fortinet reported a strong fourth quarter with revenue and billings growth that exceeded prior expectations. The company outlined optimistic guidance for 2026 alongside continued progress in its cloud security portfolio, including FortiCNAPP. Fortinet expanded its share repurchase authorization, signaling an increased focus on returning capital to shareholders. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:FTNT, the recent update comes with the stock trading at $82.76. The share price is up 6.3% year to...
